html:
1.19.21  5:39 am   what's your favorite song you've never made?

      i will decide after i finish the one i'm working on

1.19.21  4:52 am   What type of a person were you in high school? 

      normal

1.19.21  4:49 am   Should I learn a new language?

      sure

1.19.21  4:46 am   What is your favorite lyric out of all of your songs?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.19.21  4:44 am   what made that one part of the here comes the sun video your favourite??

      i just didn't want it to be the worst

1.19.21  3:54 am   What are the chords to the 'oh what a wonderful world' part of "here comes the sun" ?

      C G D

1.19.21  3:39 am   what's your favorite time signature?

      regular

1.19.21  3:15 am   Did you upload here comes the sun to YouTube early by accident?

      no but the song came out a little too early due to time zones. then i said 'oh shit, timezones'

1.19.21  3:07 am   can we get a VR version of your new video please

      which VR set do you have

1.19.21  3:01 am   how often do you use autotune for your music?

      never. not because it's not good, but because the voice is one of the best instruments to go out of tune with, so why stifle that

1.19.21  2:58 am   i recently got a guitar and a bass and i want to teach myself how to play, even though my parents insist i should take classes and i dont know what would be better. what should i do, and do you have any advice i could use?

      i guess you could take a lesson to find where the power button is, but beyond that the real goods are gonna come from your own imagination

1.19.21  2:52 am   most of your videos are 25fps, and the font you use all the time is helvetica. for here comes the sun, you changed to 30fps, and used arial instead of helvetica. why did you change these 2 things?

     first of all i think that is still helvetica. and i switched to 30fps to fit in with society a little bit better

1.19.21  2:46 am   why do u suppose so many people ask you about "new canaan" 

      they probably want to know why it has the letter 'a' so many times in the title

1.19.21  2:45 am   Is the 13th word of ur next song gonna be epic?

      no

1.19.21  2:39 am   what is it like to a s c e n d?

      it has its ups and downs

1.19.21  2:36 am   is it normal to start projects and then abandon them 2 seconds later, as a never to be opened again flp project?

      yes

1.19.21  2:16 am   How do you switch keys so smoothly?

      as soon as you hear enough music in all the keys, eventually you can just use what you need when you need it. it's like buying groceries really

1.19.21  2:08 am   i've felt like the lyrics for your recent video were an allegory; such as the intro part representing the viewers waiting and missing you and "here comes the sun" representing you coming back and uploading, is this true

      unlikely, because all that stuff was written in 2010 and 2012

1.19.21  2:03 am   What does your new song tell ? I am pretty simple person and i can't figure out the story.

      basically it's the story of things getting sad and then getting good after

1.19.21  1:48 am   why don't you write in your notebook anymore?

      that's not a place where i write. that's a place where i post things i've written previously

1.19.21  1:04 am   what size would you consider your brain to be?

      regular

1.19.21  12:49 am   What's your imagination like?

      always in danger of breaking the machine

1.19.21  12:26 am   what is a good stank face-inducing chord progression

      that would be U'N'I

1.19.21  12:21 am   When did you come up with the idea for your new song?

      august 2010

1.19.21  12:03 am   How do you count the rhythm in the "way oh way" bit in Hallelujah??? I've not practiced or written music for ages so i cannot count anymore lmoa

      it's the same tempo all the way through, about 86bpm. from the first "ay", that's beat 1, and just keep counting through two bars of 4, and then one bar of 2, and then land on the long "ay"

1.18.21  11:58 pm   How do you feel about descending fifths sequences

      fine

1.18.21  11:56 pm   do you reckon you'd prefer being able to plug your mind into a computer to directly transfer what you're trying to express into a cohesive format

     of course

      or is the fine-tuning and hours of testing more fun for making videos 

     fun if you like getting buried and suffocated by the sands of time

1.18.21  11:54 pm   Why did you take a LOONG break?

     i didn't

     Was it to do your here comes the sun mv?

     are you asking me if i took a break from music videos to make a music video

1.18.21  11:47 pm   What inspired your new song 'here comes the sun'?

      the sun

1.18.21  11:37 pm   Do you think you'll do a vid about covid

      the entire damn world is already about covid

1.18.21  11:34 pm   Do you ever look back on a song and think "I could've done better"?

      every time

1.18.21  11:34 pm   Are you going to write a pirate song in 6/8 measure?

      that sounds like something i would do

1.18.21  11:21 pm   What is your opinion on spicy notes

      that's your opinion on them, but you didn't even tell me which notes so i don't know which opinion i would have

1.18.21  11:17 pm   What is the best compliment you've ever been given?

      hey

1.18.21  11:05 pm   what comes first, the tune or the lyrics?

      hopefully neither, for best results i think

1.18.21  11:05 pm   when did you start making music?

      a long time ago

1.18.21  11:00 pm   how'd you cut about a minute out of the song "here comes the sun"?

      i re-wrote it from 2:53 onwards, keeping an eye on the clock this time

1.18.21  10:48 pm   what's the secret to knowing everything

      knowing 2 different things, and comparing them

1.18.21  10:46 pm   how are you feeling about the 3d animation?

     an interesting feeling in my stomach, like when you eat an expanding elephant

     do you think its possible to achieve your weekly upload goal using only 3d?

      sure if i make it really suck

1.18.21  10:45 pm   What was your reason to switch for 2D to 3D

     common sense really

      and will their still be 2D content?

     oh hell yes

1.18.21  10:35 pm   was "might quit" the last (mainly) 2D video?

      no way

1.18.21  10:35 pm   you lied to us. you didn't quit.

      i never said i did. maybe you did

1.18.21  10:30 pm   You show a quiet stage at the end of your new song, but how quiet actually is it.

      silent

1.18.21  10:23 pm   i just listened to/watched the music video for your new song "here comes the sun" and i gotta say while the 3d animation is certainly awesome there are also some neat effects in your older videos that wouldn't really work in 3d. do you plan on integrating 2d bits with the 3d in future videos

     yes, it's best to mix them, i reckon

      or are you permanently trapped in the third dimension?

     no i am looking for escape routes from its depths, actually

     thanks for the music

1.18.21  10:22 pm   favorite chord with less than 3 notes

      2 notes a whole step apart

1.18.21  10:16 pm   i was wondering, what music or which artists influenced how you make your stuff?

      all of them, i think

1.18.21  10:07 pm   any interest in Virtual Reality?

      yes

1.18.21  9:59 pm   how do you write a biography essay

      start by saying who the person is. try to say it in one sentence, then it will probably take the entire essay to explain it

1.18.21  9:44 pm   cycles or evee?

      ah that depends how many centuries you have available in your schedule

1.18.21  9:29 pm   How do you talent? 

      impossible. it can't be done
